description:
Whether you’re running or walking in the dark, you want to be seen. This minimalist vest wraps you in 360-degrees of reflectivity to make you visible while out on the sidewalk or on the trails.

  • Adjustable shoulder straps and waist belt for a customized fit for all body types
  • 360-degrees of reflectivity for visibility in low-light conditions
name: Nathan Vibe Reflective Vest
